Class Server

java.lang.Object
Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
Server's job is to serve, reject, wait, finish serving customers.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int id
    ID indicates the serverID.
    private double nextAvail
    nextAvail indicates the time that the server can serve the next Customer.
    private static double toServe
    toServe is the time taken for the server to serve a Customer and is a constant.
    private boolean waiting
    waiting is a boolean which indicates whether there is a waiting Customer.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Server​(int id)  
    Server​(int id, double nextAvail, boolean waiting)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int canServe​(double time)
    Determines whether that Customer should be served, wait or leave.
    int getID()  
    double getNextAvail()  
    Server updateServe​(double time)
    Updates server to Served.
    Server updateWait()
    Updates server to Wait.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • nextAvail

      private final double nextAvail
      nextAvail indicates the time that the server can serve the next Customer.

    • waiting

      private final boolean waiting
      waiting is a boolean which indicates whether there is a waiting Customer.

    • id

      private final int id
      ID indicates the serverID.

    • toServe

      private static final double toServe
      toServe is the time taken for the server to serve a Customer and is a constant.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      Server​(int id)

    • Server

      Server​(int id, double nextAvail, boolean waiting)

  • Method Details

    • canServe

      public int canServe​(double time)
      Determines whether that Customer should be served, wait or leave. Leave returns -1, wait returns 0, serve returns 1.
      Parameters:
      time - Arrival time of customer.
      Returns:
      The new status of the Event.

    • updateServe

      public Server updateServe​(double time)
      Updates server to Served.
      Parameters:
      time - Time to update to.
      Returns:
      A new server with updated next available time and that it accepts waiting customers.

    • updateWait

      public Server updateWait()
      Updates server to Wait.
      Returns:
      A new server with same serving time but updates that it has a waiting customer.

    • getNextAvail

      public double getNextAvail()

    • getID

      public int getID()
